title: Legitimacy is inverse to use of force by govt.

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the legitimacy of a government?

choices.label: It has a positive correlation with the use of brute force by the government.
It decreases when the government becomes more representative.
It has an inverse correlation with the use of brute force by the government.
It decreases when the government becomes less secular.
It decreases when an ethnic minority is voted into a leadership position.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
